summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of RPG Habit Tracker PWA. Core UI/UX works well with excellent French localization and modern design. Found critical data persistence issue between pages and navigation overlay problems.

critical_bugs.issue: Habits created on Habits page don't appear on Dashboard - localStorage sync issue
critical_bugs.impact: Users can't complete habits or see progress on main dashboard

critical_bugs.issue: Emergent badge overlay intercepts clicks preventing Settings page access
critical_bugs.impact: Settings page and some interactive elements become unclickable

integration_issues.issue: Created habits don't sync to dashboard view

passed_tests: Stats cards showing completion percentage and streaks
Navigation between Dashboard, Habits, Stats, History, Badges pages
Stats page with 6 RPG stats and radar/bars views
History page with weekly/monthly charts and calendar
Badges system with 10 levels (Novice to Immortel)
Glass morphism UI design and dark theme
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical data persistence issue where habits created on Habits page don't appear on Dashboard. Investigate localStorage sync between useRPG hook and Dashboard component. Also fix navigation overlay issue preventing Settings page access.

success_percentage.frontend: 70% - Core UI works but critical data flow issues
success_percentage.rpg_system: 60% - Display works but completion testing blocked
